candidates.CVText:
Resume - Malin Hallgren  Contact Malin Hallgren    (They/Them) Sturehillsvägen 17 11756 Stockholm malin.m.hallgren@gmail.com Employments & Internships   2023 - present - Content Designer at Paradox Interactive Working at Studio Gold with Hearts of Iron 4, the most played game of Paradox inhouse studios with a max CCU of 93000 players on Steam, and a MAU consistently over 1000000.  September - November 2021 - Intern 2D Artist at Overflow Games Created 2D assets for the game Madshot, later published by 501 Games, the asset library was used for the entire development cycle and facilitated meeting deadlines  June - October 2019 - Freelance Graphician at Lunds ProgramArkitekter  Vectorized and optimized art for use on webpages to free up permanent staff for more demanding tasks Education and Certifications  2025 - 2027 - Fullstack Developer .NET/C# Vocational education focused on acquiring the skills needed for a fullstack developer and creating several projects to mirror industry needs   2025 - Microsoft’s Foundational C# Certification  2022 - 2023 - Concept Art & Illustration studies at Hjo Folkhögskola First year of an advanced course in Concept Art, which was then interrupted as I got a job at Paradox  2020 - 2022 - Valla Game Education at Valla Folkhögskola Generalist game education providing basics of all things game dev, programming for unity in C#, creating art, and designing gameplay, interactivity and narrative  2018 - Luleå University of Technology, Visual Arts, Digital Design 19 hp 
 Volunteer Work  2020 - 2023 - Founding member of Equal Play, an organization for non-males in Östergötland that either already were in, or had an interest in, the games industry. As part of this I have been doing public speaking on equality matters Releases  March, 2025 - Hearts of Iron IV: Graveyard of Empires, an expansion focused on the Middle East. I came in post release to help with fixing technical bugs making use of my scripting abilities leaving the responsible designers free to work on fixing more design related tasks.  November 2024 - Hearts of Iron 4: Götterdämmerung, an expansion focused on Germany, Austria, Hungary, Belgium and Congo and their actions in the Second World War. So far the highest reviewed of all HoI4 DLCs. I was responsible for designing all country content for Austria, the second most played country of the expansion losing only to Germany, implementation of content for parts of both Belgium and Germany, as well as bug fixing across all three aforementioned countries    March 2024 - Hearts of Iron 4: Trial of Allegiance, an expansion focused on South America. I helped out with implementation of designs in country content for Brazil and Argentina as well as writing localization for everything I implemented. I also researched and documented equipment and technology for Chilean content and made sure that art could easily do their jobs making iconography for this. During the latter period of this I juggled responsibility between this and doing research for “Götterdämmerung”  October 2023 - Hearts of Iron 4: Arms Against Tyranny, an expansion focused on the Nordics. Having joined shortly before release I immediately got to work fixing any and all bugs I could fix, playtesting for balance and finding bugs,and teaching myself more advanced script practices as I went, as my mentor was, understandably, a bit preoccupied with release related things. Languages & Other Merits  Languages - Native language Swedish, Fully Proficient in English having worked at an entitly English speaking workplace  Softwares - Good to full proficiency with: Sublime Text, Photoshop, Miro, Google Sheets, Git, GitLab, TortoiseGit, GitHub, Jira, Visual Studio. Basic Proficiency with: Unity, Unreal, Blender, Maya, Illustrator

2019- Performed customer segmentation analysis for fortune 500 clients- Built attribution models for multi-channel marketing campaigns- Developed data quality frameworks ensuring 99.5% accuracyEDUCATIONPhD in Statistics | Tech University | 2018Master of Science in Applied Mathematics | State University | 2015Bachelor of Science in Mathematics | Liberal Arts College | 2013SKILLS Technical Skills:- Programming & Analysis: SQL (Advanced), Python (pandas, NumPy,scikit-learn, statsmodels), R, SAS, SPSS- Data Visualization: Tableau (Advanced), Power BI, Looker, D3.js,Plotly, Matplotlib, Seaborn- Statistical Methods: Regression Analysis, Time Series Forecasting,Bayesian Analysis, Machine Learning, Predictive Modeling, SurvivalAnalysis, Factor Analysis- Big Data: Apache Spark, Hadoop, Databricks, Snowflake, BigQuery,Redshift- Tools & Platforms: Excel (Advanced), Jupyter Notebook, GoogleAnalytics, Adobe Analytics, Mixpanel, Segment- Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle, Teradata- Cloud: AWS (S3, Athena, SageMaker), Azure (Synapse, ML Studio),GCP (BigQuery, Dataflow)- Business Intelligence: ETL Processes, Data Warehousing, DataModeling, KPI DevelopmentSoft Skills:- Executive Communication & Presentations- Strategic Data Analysis- Cross-Functional Leadership- Stakeholder Management- Business Acumen & Insight Generation- Team Mentoring & Development- Project Management- Critical Thinking & Problem SolvingCERTIFICATIONS- Tableau Certified Data Analyst (2023)- AWS Certified Data Analytics Specialty (2022)- Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate (2021)
